text: Tuili (Tuìli) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,023 people lived there. Its area is 24.59 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 208 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Tuili
